heroes.first_appearance: A wizard is never late, nor is he early. He arrives precisely when he means to., "Fool of a Took!"
"When my dragons are grown, we will take back what was stolen from me and destroy those who wronged me!
admé Amidala Naberrie was a human female senator who represented the people of Naboo during the final years of the Galactic Republic.
heroes.characters: Naboo Royal Starship, Naboo N-1 Starfighter, Naboo Royal Cruiser

heroes.first_appearance: Kimberly "Kim" Wexler is a fictional character from the television series Better Call Saul, a spin-off of Breaking Bad. Kim is primarily portrayed by Rhea Seehorn, and was created by Vince Gilligan and Peter Gould.
heroes.characters: University of Colorado Boulder, University of New Mexico School of Law
